content: पताका {@--1@} A flag, banner (<ab>fig.</ab> also); यं काममंजरी कामयते स हरतु सुभगपताकां <ls>Dk. 47</ls> ‘let him carry the palm of beauty or good fortune’. {@--2@} A flag-staff. {@--3@} A sign, emblem, mark, symbol. {@--4@} An episode or episodical incident in a drama, see पताकास्थानक below. {@--5@} Auspiciousness, good fortune or luck.
